channel.title: Stream isolation with multiple workstations
channel.description:
My questions pertains to Qubes-Whonix. As far as I understand it some programs (for example those that I install myself) are not configured to use stream isolation by default, so they will use the same circuit and exit node. However, if I create several whonix-workstations and have them all use the same whonix-gateway will there be stream isolation enforced between the workstations?
Thanks

item.title: Stream isolation with multiple workstations
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Clarified Stream Isolation just now.

Multiple Whonix-Workstation â„¢ are automatically stream isolated. [4]
